name: City Mayor
description: Sit on the throne as a the good government of the modern city and swipe your royal fingers either left or right to impose your will upon the city. Survive the seemingly never-ending gauntlet of requests from your police, secretary, contractors, and peoples while maintaining balance between the influential sceme of your city. But beware; each decision you make might have implications and unfortunate consequences down the road that could put your reign and your beloved city at risk!
